sentences.en: a specification of what role each member will play
sentences.cn: 每名成员担当什么角色的具体说明

sentences.en: All these parts were machined strictly to specification.
sentences.cn: 所有这些零部件都是严格地按技术要求加工制造的.

sentences.en: Can you give me a price list with specification?
sentences.cn: 你能否给我一份有规格说明的价目单 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you send the job specification to me at once?
sentences.cn: 你能把工程作业的详细说明马上送来 吗 ?

sentences.en: Examination confirmed that the quality of the products was up to specification.
sentences.cn: 经检查,产品质量[品质]合格.

sentences.en: He now had an expertly detailed specification.
sentences.cn: 现在他有了精细的规格说明.

sentences.en: I want to know his specification of details.
sentences.cn: 我想知道他对细节的详述。

sentences.en: Legislation will require UK petrol companies to meet an EU specification for petrol.
sentences.cn: 法规将要求英国的汽油公司必须达到欧盟对汽油的规格要求。

sentences.en: Michelle will also spin a customer's wool fleece to specification at a cost of $2.25 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔也会按顾客的要求为其纺羊毛呢，每盎司收费2.25美元。

sentences.en: Never mind the exact technical specification; just give us a free translation of what the machine can do.
sentences.cn: 别在意要有精确的技术说明, 只要把那机器的功用给我们意译一下就可以了.

sentences.en: The bolts met all the engineering specifications .
sentences.cn: 这些螺栓符合所有的工程设计规格。

sentences.en: The bolts met all the engineering specifications.
sentences.cn: 这些螺栓符合所有的工程设计规格。

sentences.en: The obscure charges against him lacked specification.
sentences.cn: 对他的模糊的指控缺乏明确的说明.

sentences.en: The primary limiting factor is the specification of clouds.
sentences.cn: 主要的限制因子是对云的了解.

sentences.en: The specification of such " derivative boundary conditions " is described in Section 3 - 5 .
sentences.cn: 这种 “ 导数边界条件 ” 的规定描述于 3-5 节中.

sentences.en: The specification of tables of graphics.
They struggled to limit the cost by enforcing a low-tech specification.
sentences.cn: 他们通过实施低技术规格拼命限制成本。

words.tran_cn: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的
[计] 说明符；指示语；[计] 区分符
指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书

phrases.tran_cn: 设计规范；设计规格；设计任务书；设计细节
一般技术要求；总说明书；通用技术条件government specification（s）国定技术规范
材料规格；原材料明细表
产品规格；制品技术规格
需求规格说明；要求说明
技术说明规范；规格界限

trans.tran_en: a detailed instruction about how a car, building, piece of equipment etc should be made
